item.description:
THURSDAY MARCH 10 at 7pm CTMatch.com SINGLES WHIRLYBALL PARTY

WhirlyBall™ is a combination of Basketball, Lacrosse and bumper cars. The mechanized vehicle each team member operates is also known as a WhirlyBug. Although the WhirlyBug resembles a bumper car, it is a far superior machine. Using a crank-like wheel, you will be able to turn sharper and move faster, focusing more on scoring with your Lacrosse-like scoop. Each person is equipped with a WhirlyBug and a scoop. Yeah, sounds strange, but you and everyone else on the floor are equally matched so the game only gets more fun as time goes on.

While you wait for your chance to play WhirlyBall™, we have a variety of other games in the waiting area.

Or, you can watch the game from the many windows.

 

3 Hours of UNLIMITED Whirlyball

Bring Your Own Dinner and wine or beer - Or Order Food There!

WhirlyBall East Coast

1265 John Fitch Blvd (Route 5)

South Windsor CT 06074
FREE PARKING

Tickets are $25

ADVANCE TICKET DISCOUNT - ONLY $20

Visit http://www.CTMatch.com or call (860) 236-3343 for more info


Be the first to know about our NEW EVENTS – Visit http://www.CTMatch.com/Upcoming-Events-Email-CT-Match-Dating-CT.htm and sign up for our Email Newsletter
